etymology.description: Depicts a bowl of rice on a stand
etymology.interpretation: 皀(皀) illustrates a simple image of a bowl containing rice placed on a pedestal. This image effectively conveys the concept of a staple food item presented respectfully.

examples.chinese: 夜空中皀的星光闪烁(夜空中皀的星光閃爍)。
examples.pinyin: Yèkōng zhōng càn de xīngguāng shǎnshuò.
examples.english: Under the night sky, the brilliant starlight twinkles.

examples.chinese: 他调色板上丰富的皀色让人惊叹(他調色板上豐富的皀色讓人驚嘆)。
examples.pinyin: Tā tiáosè bǎn shàng fēngfù de càn sè ràng rén jīngtàn.
examples.english: The rich càn hue on his palette astonishes viewers.

examples.chinese: 清晨日出时(清晨日出時)，薄雾中映出一抹皀光(薄霧中映出一抹皀光)。
examples.pinyin: Qīngchén rìchū shí, bó wù zhōng yìng chū yī mǒ càn guāng.
examples.english: At dawn, as the sun rises, a glimpse of càn light appears through the mist.
